metadata.summary: Execute Microsoft 365 CLI commands from LimaCharlie using the Cloud CLI Extension with client secret authentication for tenant management.
metadata.primary_use_case: Manage Microsoft 365 tenant users and resources programmatically from LimaCharlie detection and response rules

extracted_apis.description: Execute Microsoft 365 CLI commands via LimaCharlie extension with PnP CLI for Microsoft 365
Extension request action to run M365 commands with cloud='m365', command_tokens array, and credentials parameters
Disable or enable Microsoft 365 user accounts via Entra ID user management
Authenticate to Microsoft 365 tenant using client secret credentials (executed automatically by LimaCharlie)

cross_refs.description: Similar cloud CLI extension pattern for Azure management, uses same credential secret format (appID/clientSecret/tenantID)
